title: What are they doing to Wrightsville Ave. around the Bradley Creek bridge area?  They have cones from Rogersville to Greymarsh neighborhood.  They really need a traffic light and turning lane at Hooker Rd. because the vision of traffic from Rogersville to Hooker is obscured by the bridge.
